name: The Green Lantern Corps Quiz | DC Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: I trained Hal Jordan and many other Green Lanterns. I was once killed by Jordan, but I'm alive and healthy....for now. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Kilowog.

	Kilowog is large and pink, resembling a boar in some aspects. Kilowog hails from the planet Bolovax Vik, which was destroyed during the Crises on Infinite Earths.

questions.text: I look human, except for the golden skin and the pointy ears. I shared a kiss with Hal Jordan, and temporarily lived on Earth. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Arisia.

	Arisia fell in love with Hal Jordan, the Green Lantern of Earth. They lived together for a time, with Arisia taking a job as a model, but eventually parted ways.

questions.text: I was once a battle-marred warlord, but I was recruited by Hal Jordan. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Kreon.

	Missing an arm and an eye from many battles, Kreon hails from the planet Tebis. He was defeated in battle with Parallax, a demonic entity that had posessed Jordan.

True.

	Raker Qarrigat fights against the despotic Darkseid, tyrant of Apokolips. He was abandoned by the Guardians who had created the Green Lantern Corps, but was given a power ring and battery by another Green Lantern.

questions.text: My spaceship crashed, and with my dying breath I willed my ring to Hal Jordan. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Abin Sur.

	Abin Sur was a bald, pink-skinned alien who protected Sector 2814, which included Earth. When his spaceship crashed in the desert, he commanded his ring to find a worthy heir, which turned out to be Hal Jordan.

questions.text: I am a veteran of the Rann-Thanagar war and a lizard-like humanoid. I was saved by a Green Lantern ring right before I was to be executed. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Isamot Kol.

	Isamot Kol was partnered up with an alien native to Rann, Vath Sarn. Because he is a Thanagarian, Kol was slow to warm to Sarn, who was also a veteran of the Rann-Thanagar war.

questions.text: I am a bald alien from Rann. I found my Green Lantern ring on the battlefield and tried to use it in battle! Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Vath Sarn.

	The Guardians of the Universe did not intend for a Green Lantern ring to be used in planetary wars, and Sarn was immediately transported to Oa for training.

questions.text: I am a female alien who hails from the planet Korugar. I am of the same race as Sinestro. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Soranik Natu.

	Soranik was a neurosurgeon before she became a Green Lantern. Like every Korugaran, she thought poorly of the Green Lantern Corps, for the first Korugaran was Sinestro, who became evil and ruled over his native people. What she did not realize is that not all Green Lanterns were like that.

questions.text: I am a Green Lantern who led a rebellion against the evil Sinestro, and eventually became his replacement! Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Katma Tui.

	Katma later married human Green Lantern John Stewart, and once gave up marriage to remain in the Corps. She was killed by the villain Star Sapphire while she was powerless.

questions.text: I've got blue hair and skin, and swear a much different oath than many Green Lanterns! Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Jack T. Chance

	"You who are wicked, evil and mean I'm the nastiest creep you've ever seen! Come one, come all; put up a fight. I'll pound your butt with Green Lantern's light!" Jack T. Chance opted to wear his old clothes instead of a standard Green Lantern uniform, pinning a badge to his jacket instead.
